name: WPMobile.App — Android and iOS Mobile Application
author: WPMobile.App

sections.description:
WPMobile.App build the Android and iPhone-iPad native mobile application of your WordPress site and allow you to publish it on Google Play and Apple Store.

Our Android and iOS mobile app offer

  • 💳 VERY AFFORDABLE PRICE – We only sell lifetime licences, no subscription, no hidden fees.

Android 79€ // iOS 79€ // Android + iOS 149€

  • 🎉 FREE TEST – You can test your mobile app with the Android and iOS demo app. The only thing you need to do is install this plugin and then you can view your mobile app as it will be in its final version.

  • 🖌 CUSTOMIZATION – The mobile app of your site will look like your site, you will be able to choose the name, the logo and the theme of your mobile app. No mention of our brand or advertisement, the mobile app is white-labeled.

  • 📲 GREAT COMPATIBILITY – Our mobile apps are compatible with smartphones and tablets, require only Android 4.1 minimum and iOS 8, this represents the vast majority of the smartphone market.

  • 👌 VERY EASY PUBLISH – We take care of all the technical work, no software to download or complicated manipulation to do. We have automated the entire compilation process and are able to send you your application in 20 minutes!

  • 💬 SUPPORT TEAM – We are here to help you and answer all your requests as quickly as possible. We’ll try to answer all your questions ASAP.

  • ⚙ NATIVE MOBILE APP – Fast and 100% adapted to all smartphones, screen sizes, software and networks native applications are the top of mobile applications, whether for Android or iOS.

What do you get with WPMobile.App, the mobile app creator?

  • 👍 AUTOMATIC APP UPDATE – When new content is posted on your site, the application is automatically updated, you have absolutely nothing to do. The mobile app is able to display all the contents present on your site, at any time.

  • 📢 NOTIFICATIONS – With unlimited push notification, you can talk with your users, with an amazing open rate. Manually or when a page or article is published users of your mobile app receive a notification that directly opens the right page on the mobile app.

  • 📈 REAL-TIME STATISTICS – From the WordPress panel you can access to 12 stats about the mobile app usage. Number of installations, graphical evolution of traffic, actions on the mobile app, geolocation, content view, language, browsing history, … All statistics are real-time and hosted on your site.

  • 🔎 SEARCH ENGINE – Users can search for your content directly from the mobile app. Directly from the app the users will be able to access all your content in just a few clicks, exploiting the power of the wordpress search engine.

  • 👋 SOCIAL SHARING – The users of your mobile app will be able to share your pages and your articles in 1 click by using all the applications installed on their smartphone (Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin, messaging, SMS, …).

  • ✍ COMMENTS – If comments are enabled on the page being read, the user can read all the comments and access a form to leave a comment. We use the native WordPress system and the mobile app passes most anti-spam systems.
sections.installation:
WordPress Admin Method

  1. Go to you administration area in WordPress Plugins > Add
  2. Look for WPMobile.App (use search form)
  3. Click on Install and activate the plugin
  4. Find the settings page through Settings > WPMobile.App

FTP Method

  1. Upload the complete wpappninja folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Find the settings page through the WPMobile.App menu on the toolbar

sections.reviews:
Excellent

By jonathanblindell on February 18, 2024

Used this for a client a while ago and the app and support is incredible. Going back to use it again for a site of my own.

Great plugin and fantastic support! BBpress app

By ibnat on January 16, 2024

Looking for a plugin to convert a WP BBPress forum to a mobile app was at a standstill until I came across this fantastic and reasonably priced WPMobile.

The support from Amauri has been exceptional and I am really pleased with the result which is a fully functioning BBPress forum with push notifications on mobile devices.

With the addiction of many people to the big social medias my forum was dying a death but now it been given a new lease of life!

Well done! Thankyou!

Takes a little time, but support is amazing

By ccolotti on January 2, 2024

I started down this Website to App road a few weeks ago. I found a few options and what I quickly learned was the difference is in the support of the options, not just the features/functions. While one option had some very interesting features, the support (and the reviews) were not good. Then I switched over to this one and the support has been amazing. I just purchased a license today since all the testing, and help from the developer has gotten it to a comfortable point to keep moving forward. Next will be actually trying to get the app published in the stores, and then continue to fine tune the app for my users.

Thank you so much for your support this far it truly was the difference for going with your app and I look for ward to continued use and promoting it soon to my customers.

Fantastic Assistance!

By webmasternatad2 on November 10, 2023

Amauri is awesome.

Being a neophyte web designer, and being directed by people who don't always understand web and web design, Amauri has been so helpful w/ the app. I usually have a response within 24h, often much less when I have a question. Even when I hadn't yet purchased the app, he was able and willing to help with the questions I had.

The FAQs are pretty spot on, and even when there are differences between what I see on my screen, and what is listed in the FAQ, Amauri is quick to assist so I can understand.

I am super pleased with the plugin and appreciate all he has done. Keep it up!

Great Technical Support

By monrdie on November 8, 2023

Amauri's WPMobile.App played a crucial role in ensuring the survival of our magazine during the challenging times of the COVID-19 pandemic. With our physical magazine edition entirely banned, we were faced with the task of reinventing our business model and content strategy. Since 2020, Amauri's app has been our lifeline, enabling us to maintain business as usual in this disruptive environment.

What sets Amauri apart is their unwavering commitment to providing exceptional technical support. Over the past three years, they have been instrumental in assisting us with the updates required by Android and Apple. This continuous support has allowed our apps to remain available on the AppStore and Google Play without any interruptions.

Thanks to Amauri and their WPMobile.App, we've not only survived but thrived. The app has been the key to expanding our reach beyond our home country of Bolivia. Our content is now accessible in over 180 countries, leading to a significant increase in our readership. We extend our gratitude to Amauri for their indispensable role in our success. Thank you very much, Amauri!

Great plugin - great support

By apprivoisersonstress on October 9, 2023

The plugin is perfectly doing its job. Very easy to update your site to have your app working the way you want.

The support provided is very professionnal, quick and accurate.

This plugin is definitely a "must have" to get un native app with the functionality you need.

Many thanks to the developper !

Cette extension fonctionne parfaitement et fait le job. Il est facile de mettre à jour votre site et l'extension pour que votre app fasse ce que vous voulez !

De plus le support si vous avez des questions ou si vous rencontrez un problème est hyper pro et rapide !

Cette extension est un indispensable pour avoir une appli native fonctionnelle et adaptée à vos besoins

Better than most expensive

By radhikamal on October 9, 2023

This plugin is the best and affordable. Other software requires monthly payment and very expensive. Alhamdulillah the customer support is very kind and responsive. Thank you so much.

Don't look elsewhere!!!!

By jabbou on October 3, 2023

(English)

Who doesn't dream of a plugin capable of exceptional application quality assisted by one of the best developers in the world in different languages available for each pitfall encountered… I would never have imagined a plugin of such such power with almost palpable remote assistance! Our application has been successfully accepted by Google Play and Apple Store, the genius moreover, our app includes two Wordpress sites for greater fluidity, combined into a single app thanks to WPMOBILE for the price of one! Very happy to have met Amaury who offers you the warmest and most efficient premium assistance you could dream of! Small anecdote, after a recent display problem, a piece of code dating from a year and a half ago resolved the problem before calling on Amaury again as a protective bot! Look no further, my respects Amaury!!!

(French)

Qui ne rêve pas d'un plugin capable d'une qualité exeptionnelle d'application assisté par l'un des meilleur développeur au monde dans différents langages à disposition pour chaque embuche rencontrée… Jamais je n'aurais imaginé un plugin d'une tel puissance avec une assistance à distance presque palpable ! Notre application à été accepté avec succès par Google Play et Apple Store, le génie par ailleurs, notre app comporte deux sites Wordpress pour plus de fluidité, réunis en une seule app grâce à WPMOBILE pour le prix d'une ! Très heureux d'avoir fait la connaissance d'Amaury qui vous offre une assistance premium des plus chalereuse et efficace que l'on puisse rêver ! Petite anecdote, après un récent problème d'affichage, un morceau de code datant d'un ans et demi auparavant aura règlé le problème avant de refaire appel à Amaury comme un bot protecteur ! N'allez pas chercher plus loin mes respects Amaury !!!

Best App Plugin for Wordpress

By Gezak (gmavridis) on September 10, 2023

short_description: Android and iOS mobile application for any WordPress wesbite. Easy setup, free test.
description:
WPMobile.App build the Android and iPhone-iPad native mobile application of your WordPress site and allow you to publish it on Google Play and Apple Store.

Our Android and iOS mobile app offer

  • 💳 VERY AFFORDABLE PRICE – We only sell lifetime licences, no subscription, no hidden fees.

Android 79€ // iOS 79€ // Android + iOS 149€

  • 🎉 FREE TEST – You can test your mobile app with the Android and iOS demo app. The only thing you need to do is install this plugin and then you can view your mobile app as it will be in its final version.

  • 🖌 CUSTOMIZATION – The mobile app of your site will look like your site, you will be able to choose the name, the logo and the theme of your mobile app. No mention of our brand or advertisement, the mobile app is white-labeled.

  • 📲 GREAT COMPATIBILITY – Our mobile apps are compatible with smartphones and tablets, require only Android 4.1 minimum and iOS 8, this represents the vast majority of the smartphone market.

  • 👌 VERY EASY PUBLISH – We take care of all the technical work, no software to download or complicated manipulation to do. We have automated the entire compilation process and are able to send you your application in 20 minutes!

  • 💬 SUPPORT TEAM – We are here to help you and answer all your requests as quickly as possible. We’ll try to answer all your questions ASAP.

  • ⚙ NATIVE MOBILE APP – Fast and 100% adapted to all smartphones, screen sizes, software and networks native applications are the top of mobile applications, whether for Android or iOS.

What do you get with WPMobile.App, the mobile app creator?

  • 👍 AUTOMATIC APP UPDATE – When new content is posted on your site, the application is automatically updated, you have absolutely nothing to do. The mobile app is able to display all the contents present on your site, at any time.

  • 📢 NOTIFICATIONS – With unlimited push notification, you can talk with your users, with an amazing open rate. Manually or when a page or article is published users of your mobile app receive a notification that directly opens the right page on the mobile app.

  • 📈 REAL-TIME STATISTICS – From the WordPress panel you can access to 12 stats about the mobile app usage. Number of installations, graphical evolution of traffic, actions on the mobile app, geolocation, content view, language, browsing history, … All statistics are real-time and hosted on your site.

  • 🔎 SEARCH ENGINE – Users can search for your content directly from the mobile app. Directly from the app the users will be able to access all your content in just a few clicks, exploiting the power of the wordpress search engine.

  • 👋 SOCIAL SHARING – The users of your mobile app will be able to share your pages and your articles in 1 click by using all the applications installed on their smartphone (Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin, messaging, SMS, …).

  • ✍ COMMENTS – If comments are enabled on the page being read, the user can read all the comments and access a form to leave a comment. We use the native WordPress system and the mobile app passes most anti-spam systems.
